FuncDef: The display ip extcommunity-filter command displays detailed configurations of the VPN-Target extended community filter.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the basic VPN-Target extended community filter number.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 199.

Specifies the advanced VPN-Target extended community filter number.
The value is an integer that ranges from 200 to 399.

ExtraInfo: The extended community attribute is a private attribute of BGP. An extended community filter is used to filter VPN routes.
